hydrogen-bond
 
loop

isotope-specific
 
dynamics,
 
and
 
multi-angle
 
temporal
 
perception
 
at
 
the
 
molecular
 
scale.
 
Empirical
 
validation
 
against
 
hydrogen
 
spectral

molecular
 
dynamics
 
simulations,
 
and
 
literature-derived
 
cluster
 
behavior

predictions.

●  Validated  known  effects:  molecular  geometry  and  dipole  moments,  hydrogen-bond  
network
 
stability.
